channel.title: Need to recover kids password
channel.description: On my server someone typed in wrong pass at log in, he can't get on now, Im running mithscape V_1 and i opened his acc's character file, it says Password: 4133828255246475627, obviously its encrypted, how can i reverse encrypt to recover his acc! Please help =] Thanks

item.title: Need to recover kids password
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

twinky12341:

i know almost all 508’s have encryption never saw one with letters.

Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Need to recover kids password
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“davidi2, post:8, topic:298874”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=395243.msg2936557#msg2936557 date=1251593789]
Acually thats not encryption, encryption uses BOTH numbers and letters. Try changing the pass back to what he needs it, obviously he used a changepass code and put too many stuff, or he was hacked.
[/quote]
Lol… its a stringToLong encryption dumby… learn about this stuff before posting…[/quote]
Out of the many years ive delt with encryption ive never seen encryption WITHOUT letters or numbers in 1 thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Need to recover kids password
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“stewie0888, post:4, topic:298874”]have him log into a new account

then once he logs in
tell him to log out

then open both char files and copy everything but the password to the new account

that will give him all his levels, quests, items, and all that[/quote]So basically just what I said?

Read full topic

then once he logs in
tell him to log out

then open both char files and copy everything but the password to the new account

that will give him all his levels, quests, items, and all that

item.title: Need to recover kids password

@CoonHunter wrote:

Acually thats not encryption, encryption uses BOTH numbers and letters. Try changing the pass back to what he needs it, obviously he used a changepass code and put too many stuff, or he was hacked.

Read full topic

item.title: Need to recover kids password
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Just ask “this kid” to log in with another character using the password he wants, ask him to log out of that account, grab the encrypted password in the account he just logged out of, copy and paste it into “the kids” account, overwriting his current password that “the kid” doesn’t know what it is, and tell him to log in using that password, have fun.

Read full topic
